page.title: 11My School Year-Spring/Summer
page.content: In January we went to London to see "Wind in The Willows" at Sadlers Wells. We stopped at Greenwich for lunch and saw the Cutty Sark. In April we went to Mr.Wright's farm and we saw a lamb being born.Our topic this term was Eskimos,and we did Pinocchio,Fairground and made some puppets and theatres. We made an igloo that we can play in and some clay models. In the Summer term we got a play house and fort for our field.A book shop was opened in our school and we had a fete. Soon it will be Sports Day and we are going to visit London.Our topic this term has been the Domesday Project and we have had tadpoles and incubated some eggs.At the end of term Mr.King,our headmaster,is going to retire.Then I will go into another class but I think being in Class 2 has been fabulous!!
